"One very important point we have noticed in connection with
the yellow fever in existence here, is that quite a number of persons
have been attacked by the disease within three to six days after
their arrival in the city. This certainly tends to show that the
potency.
1853. For the week ending July 23d, 1853, the number of deaths

of this year we have but 119. This difference may be in some
